table.comment: able - stores "product info" for premiums and can be used for non-incentive products
table.name: civicrm_product

field.name: options
field.title: Options
field.comment: Store comma-delimited list of color, size, etc. options for the product.

field.name: image
field.title: Image
field.comment: Full or relative URL to uploaded image - fullsize.

field.name: thumbnail
field.title: Thumbnail
field.comment: Full or relative URL to image thumbnail.

field.name: price
field.title: Price
field.comment: Sell price or market value for premiums. For tax-deductible contributions, this will be stored as non_deductible_amount in the contribution record.

field.name: currency
field.comment: 3 character string, value from config setting or input via user.

field.name: min_contribution
field.title: Minimum Contribution
field.comment: Minimum contribution required to be eligible to select this premium.

field.name: cost
field.title: Cost
field.comment: Actual cost of this product. Useful to determine net return from sale or using this as an incentive.

field.name: is_active
field.title: Is Active
field.comment: Disabling premium removes it from the premiums_premium join table below.

field.name: period_type
field.title: Period Type
field.comment: Rolling means we set start/end based on current day, fixed means we set start/end for current year or month (e.g. 1 year + fixed -> we would set start/end for 1/1/06 thru 12/31/06 for any premium chosen in 2006)

field.name: fixed_period_start_day
field.title: Fixed Period Start Day
field.comment: Month and day (MMDD) that fixed period type subscription or membership starts.

field.name: duration_interval
field.title: Duration Interval
field.comment: Number of units for total duration of subscription, service, membership (e.g. 12 Months).

field.name: frequency_unit
field.title: Frequency Unit
field.comment: Frequency unit and interval allow option to store actual delivery frequency for a subscription or service.

field.name: frequency_interval
field.title: Frequency Interval
field.comment: Number of units for delivery frequency of subscription, service, membership (e.g. every 3 Months).
